keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in renewable power, insulating homes and planting trees.
People's Vote on the Brexit deal.

mentions.candidate: Ewan Hoyle has a background in science and understands evidence-based policy.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Liberal Democrats are winning across the UK.

issues.brexitEurope: People's Vote on the Brexit deal.
issues.environment: Tackling the Climate Emergency by investing in renewable power, insulating homes and planting trees.

housing.content: Insulating homes as part of tackling the climate emergency.

endorsements.endorsement: Supporting Ewan Hoyle to be the next MP for Glasgow Central.

quotes.text: Liberal Democrats are winning across the UK.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on stopping Brexit and preventing a second Scottish independence referendum. It highlights the environmental policy of the Scottish Liberal Democrats and mentions the party leader, Jo Swinson. Ewan Hoyle's background in science is referenced as part of his profile.
